overview: Chris Kontakis- With a background in Visual Communication & Graphic Design and over 8 years experience in the web and graphic design industry Chris has worked for various companies across the united states as creative director, including Phoenix, Scottsdale, Las Vegas, Seattle, Chicago & Los Angeles. Bringing experience in User Interface Design and Internet Strategies both internet and software related. Other experience includes video production/editing, sound production and animation. Txtmailer was an idea come to life with partner and long time friend Chris Agra. “We both set out to create a product to benefit everyone, business owners and the people using the application. The application provides a new way of advertising and helps play a roll in paper waste control by eliminating the need to use paper in useless ads.”
